attr.title: Inferna
attr.desc:
Originally made in 1 week for the 8x8 Game Jam!
Charge and burn your way through a labyrinthine complex as a ball of fire!
attr.inst: Download Inferna from itch.io and place Inferna_v1.0.zip in ports/inferna/assets.
attr.inst_md: Download Inferna from [itch.io](https://milkbar-lads.itch.io/inferna) and place Inferna_v1.0.zip in ports/inferna/assets.
